# operator bitwise
a=int(input("masukan nilai A= "))
b=int(input("masukan nilai B=  "))
# operator and
C= a & b
print("{} & {}={}". format(a,b,c))
# operator OR
c= a | b
print("{} | {}={}". format(a,b,c))
# operator xOR
c= a ^ b
print("{} | {}={}". format(a,b,c))
# operator not
c= ~a 
print("~{}= {}". format(a,b,c))
# operator shift left
c= a << b
print("{} << {}={}". format(a,b,c))
# opertaor shift left
c= a >> b
print("{} >> {}={}". format(a,b,c))
